name: 迷走パラダイス
summary:
Produce. Yonder Voice(http://yondervoice.net)
Original by. ZUN(上海アリス幻樂団)
Compose & Arrange. KD、GhostFinal、himmel、天遊(Aerial Audio System)、iKz、Zris、Mashiro
Lyric. 蒼羅杏(Yonder Voice)、宇文子牙、djhmojt
Vocal. 瑶山百霊(Yonder Voice)
Mixing. KD、cnsouka(Vanguard Sound)、瑶山百霊、himmel、GhostFinal、iKz、Mashiro
Illustration. NEKO
Graphic Design. Kuma桃
Special Thanks. 三牛、Alyssa、Paul Wang、and you
info:
